name: Essay Maker 0.3
tagline: GET RID OF THAT STUPID GRAPHIC ESSAY ORGANIZER.
body:
> I bet if you asked a kid what they think about graphic essay organizers, they'd all despise them. Graphic organizers on paper are old. Lucidchart did this right by making graphic organizers online. The only one they left out was the graphic essay organizer. We fixed that. ********************************* ## Downloads: ### EssayMaker Lite

This version of EssayMaker is for older computers that don't run very fast

Works on Windows XP and above
### EssayMaker Full

This version of EssayMaker is for newish computers that don't run pretty well.

Works on Windows XP and above
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
